US Senate committee takes up bill targeting China's BGI, WuXi ApptecA bill in the U.S. Senate that would restrict business with China's BGI, WuXi Apptec and other biotech companies on national security grounds faces its first big test in Congress on Wednesday. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 11:07:03 GMT U4FGDP4F6VJ4PEGCMHGHD7U2YE https://www.reuters.com/technology/us-senate-committee-takes-up-bill-targeting-chinas-bgi-wuxi-apptec-2024-03-06/Karen Freifeld可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Morning Bid: Powell tees up after megacaps scatterA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan Wed, 06 Mar 2024 11:03:16 GMT ZLFCMG2I3FMURCR4TK22OUTT6M https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/global-markets-view-usa-2024-03-06/Reuters市场美国市场
China complains about Dutch news report on TaiwanChina complained on Wednesday about a news report by the Dutch public broadcaster NOS on Taiwan, a signal of Beijing's hardening position towards the island. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 10:41:47 GMT XI2MFPYPM5NJ5KVNDD3DESWBJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china-complains-about-dutch-news-report-taiwan-2024-03-06/Reuters世界
JD.com beats quarterly revenue estimates as heavy discounts buoy demandChinese online retailer JD.com reported fourth-quarter revenue above estimates on Wednesday and upsized its share repurchase program, as aggressive price cuts helped revive demand from consumers grappling with an uncertain economy. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 10:35:52 GMT 7A5BKBVPMFNNVCKSCK5632IY6E https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-e-commerce-firm-jdcom-beats-fourth-quarter-revenue-estimates-2024-03-06/Reuters世界中国
Siemens has high hopes for India as economy booms, executive saysSiemens is "very positive" about its prospects in India, managing board member Matthias Rebellius said, as the country's economy booms and offers the chance to diversify from China. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 09:04:34 GMT YKDGJQFKEZOK7HXRYJZYMX4VQY https://www.reuters.com/technology/siemens-has-high-hopes-india-economy-booms-executive-says-2024-03-06/John Revill商业活力
Morgan Stanley cuts 9% of China fund unit staff amid market rout, sources sayMorgan Stanley has laid off about 9% of its staff at its asset management business unit in China, two people with direct knowledge of the matter said, as the country's spiralling stock market dampens prospects for its $3.8 trillion fund sector. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 08:03:26 GMT UYZ3CT5LAFMORHDPDCLAQSIABA https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/morgan-stanley-cuts-9-china-fund-unit-staff-amid-market-rout-sources-say-2024-03-06/Selena Li, Yu Xie商业工作世界
China's 5% growth target for 2024 is achievable, state planner saysThe head of China's state planner said on Wednesday that the government's 5% economic growth target this year, which many analysts say is ambitious, is achievable and that he expects the world's second-largest economy to have a good first quarter. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 08:00:56 GMT IP5GIBXV55PN3O5B6ZCYTIIR3Y https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-step-up-economic-policy- adjustmentments-2024-state-planner-says-2024-03-06/Kevin Yao, Albee Zhang世界中国
South China Sea collision not reason to invoke defence treaty with U.S., says Philippine presidentA recent collision of Philippine and Chinese vessels in the South China Sea is not the time or reason to invoke a Mutual Defense Treaty with the United States, Philippines President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. said on Wednesday. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 07:26:18 GMT EKTSHDG7PZO43BGA7MABMSO3DA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-china-sea-collision-not-reason-invoke-defence-treaty-with-us-says-2024-03-06/Reuters世界亚太地区
ASEAN and Australia call for an end to destabilising actions in the South China SeaAll countries should refrain from unilateral actions in the South China Sea that endanger the disputed area's peace, security and stability, Australia and ASEAN said in a joint statement at the conclusion of a three-day summit on Wednesday. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 06:39:37 GMT LHHABPBG6ZPSTGSY45LOI6COTM https://www.reuters.com/world/asean-australia-call-an-end-destabilising-actions-south-china-sea-2024-03-06/Reuters世界
Sri Lanka committed to repaying debt within 2027-2042 schedule, president saysSri Lanka is committed to repaying its debt within the 2027-2042 schedule, President Ranil Wickremesinghe said on Wednesday, adding that successful debt restructuring negotiations will bring annual external debt payments down to 4% of GDP. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 06:26:11 GMT 5LSGO25WANJCJCSB5KL4IW7VYM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/sri-lanka-commited-repaying-debt-within-2027-2042-schedule-president-says-2024-03-06/Uditha Jayasinghe世界亚太地区
Can China maintain growth and 'transform' its economy at the same time?Chinese Premier Li Qiang's vision for the country contains an inherent contradiction: his aim to "transform" the economic model may be incompatible with keeping growth rates steady at around 5%. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 06:14:58 GMT P2ULS36NVRIK3P4VRFTCR72HQM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/can-china-maintain-growth-transform-its-economy-same-time-2024-03-06/Joe Cash, Ellen Zhang, Kevin Yao市场宏观问题
